summary: IT Systems Engineer of 20 years with a strong background in communication and information systems, networking, cloud technologies, and automation. Seeking a position where I can bring strong analytical and problem-solving skills to a company with opportunities for expanding upon an existing skill base.

treasury_media.title: Valerie Hayes - Resume 2020
treasury_media.description: My most recent resume as a one-page CV; updated to reflect my most recent position(s).

treasury_media.title: Valerie Hayes - Resume
treasury_media.description: This is my current resume with a focus on my IS skill set.

certifications.name: OpenStack Foundation's Certified OpenStack Administrator - COA

projects.title: IT Systems Consolidation and Upgrade
projects.description: Upgrade and consolidate the IT systems from a mixed Mac OS X and Windows environment to a Windows 2012r2 AD domain with Exchange server and services. This major project encompasses all aspects of our IT infrastructure. Replacing all the Mac OS X servers with Windows AD controllers, replacing our backup software suite to match, new RAID management, and working with our existing SANS hardware, will bring our IT systems out of a mixed environment with limited functionality into a full suite of industry standard tools, software, and hardware. This also presents us the opportunity to have a common hardware platform for our clients, which enables us to set up very rapid network disaster recovery on our clients as well as our servers.

projects.title: WAN and ISP Upgrade
projects.description: Upgrade our ISP service from a series of bonded T1's with a VPN between two office locations, to a L2/L3 VLAN trunking solution to bring both sites onto the same network without the need for a VPN tunnel, and the reduced bandwidth it imposes. This also included an upgrade to our voice telephony circuits. This project later evolved into an MPLS solution after a few years, also with further upgrades and enhancements to our telephony services in conjunction with the upgraded LAN/WAN services between the two sites.

profile_positions.description:
As a solution engineer for IT infrastructure, my job is to create high level designs and
engineer solutions to address technological and organizational problems throughout
Rabobank's IT infrastructure. Starting with a vision and in cooperation with the architects of
the infra and enterprise domains, I establish standards, ensure continuity, integration,
automation, and life cycle management of infrastructure systems, applications, and
development efforts. As a solution engineer, it is my job to keep a holistic overview and
approach to the direction and changes infrastructure adopts moving forward. I have helped
initiate, and participate in the steering and development of the banks digital transformation
efforts. I am able to dive deeply into technical discussions without losing sight of the holistic
vision. I have used this position to further educate and advocate for a cloud-native DevOps
way of working and development from within Rabobank. The position I have strived for is
starting with on-premise infrastructure to enable the developers and business units to
move to a cloud-native way of working, and to be one of the driving agents of change from
within the organization.
profile_positions.title: Solution Engineer

profile_positions.description: As a cloud engineer, my primary purpose was to implement a MVP instance of Red Hat's OpenStack as our private/hybrid cloud for Rabobank. Successfully implemented a full-featured and robust OpenStack private cloud. This required integrating a private cloud with an existing infrastructure landscape that has been built up over thirty years, and has seen a plethora of organizational shuffles and with a myriad of procedural overhead. This started my championing and advocating for a hybrid cloud model for Rabobank, and started educating and extolling the benefits of Infrastructure as a Service, Infrastructure as Code, DevOps principles and values, radical automation, containerization, kubernetes, and all things agile and DevOps.
profile_positions.title: Engineer, Cloud and Platform

profile_positions.description: As a Senior Systems Adminsitrator, I was responsible for all servers, services, and applications for Rabobank's day-to-day operations. I was required to understand and work within the entire OSI model in order to support, troubleshoot, and implement software and hardware solutions critical to the bank's operations. This was an operational role treated much like an site reliability engineer. I also provided root cause analysis and after action review of outages, and provides advice, mentoring, and training to other system administrators as well as  support technicians. I refactored and developed much of the business automation within the bank, using that opportunity to automated time consuming processes. I brought DevOps principles and way of working to our department, and started to build agile processes across the organization, with a unique take on our Tier III as both engineers and implementers, in an operations based environment.
profile_positions.title: AVP/Senior Platform Systems Engineer

profile_positions.title: System Administrator

profile_positions.description: Research, design, engineer, test, install, troubleshoot, and repair a broad range of communications and information systems in a mission critical space launch and satellite processing facility. Provide services and systems/networks that meet customer requirements. Provide Launch and processing support, monitor networks and equipment real-time and provide immediate response and support. Write procedures, manuals, and create engineering and technical drawings. Monitor, dispatch, and respond to equipment alarms, as well as user/help desk support requests.
profile_positions.title: Information Systems Technician/Systems Administrator

profile_positions.description: General communications and information systems technician. Primary duties were to install, maintain, troubleshoot, and repair communication circuits, networks, servers, and client workstations. Equipment and infrastructure installation, to include cabling and racks. Provide communications support for mission control operators and voice panels/networks and users. Ensure 99.9% up-time during critical mission operations. Install, groom, and terminate facility network cabling and fiber optics.
profile_positions.title: Information Systems Technician

profile_positions.description: Perform hardware and software isolation and repair of state-of-the-art electronic, computer and network equipment and related systems using complex test and analysis equipment, diagnostic software, hand tools and technical publications; perform computer and electronic system hardware and software installation, configuration and modification; analyze the configuration and monitor the operation of computer telecommunications and networking systems; calibrate and repair a wide variety of precision electronic test equipment; perform information security and computer network defense functions for secure networks and communication systems; maintain fleet cryptologic permanent and carry-on direct support systems required in special land, sea surface and subsurface operations. Supervised two shifts of 12 people working 24/7 as a direct supervisor and department manager. Performed employee evaluations, counseling, provided technical guidance, and performed support and trouble resolution as a second or third tier technical expert.
profile_positions.title: Cryptologic Technician, Maintenance
